name: hm02
effect: Teaches Fly to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Fly to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn. This can also be used to fly to any familiar town.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn. This can also be used to fly to any familiar town.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn. This can also be used to fly to any familiar town.
